comments.commentText: I had a dream to make my organization, nevertheless I didn't have got enough of money to do this. Thank goodness my friend advised to use the personal loans.

Having lived in Bolivia and knowing the difficulties of the people of the country, I am delighted to hear about IMPRO and its support. Thank you for the update. I feel lucky to be able to have a small part of Kiva in order to help our Bolivian brothers and sisters.

Dear Alexis,
Thank you for the news you share with Kiva's friends. And thank you mainly for your work in Bolivia. Thank you friends!
-John
